numlitem.para: Flight altitude remains at or below FL250,
Fully functional observer’s seat(s) is available for all upper deck occupants, and
Appropriate upper deck occupancy procedures are incorporated.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: A fully operable observer’s seat must be available for each upper deck occupant.
Flight altitude remains at or below FL250.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "PASS/SUPERNUMERARY OXYGEN SYS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
